section.section: Five members of the Authority are a quorum.
An act of the Authority must be approved by a majority vote of the members attending a meeting at which a quorum is present.

text.section:
A member of the Authority:
may not receive compensation as a member of the Authority; but
is entitled to reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.
A member of the Authority shall file a public disclosure of financial interests as required under the Maryland Public Ethics Law.
